description: This file declares the Response class used for handling JSON-RPC responses over WebSockets in the project. It inherits from a base Message class and provides methods to access message ID, check if the response is a result or error, and retrieve result or error details as JSON objects.
external_files: external_methods”: [] , // None explicitly called in this header; methods would be invoked in implementation files, not declared here. So left empty or could include inherited methods if needed.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message in the WebSockets namespace, providing access to response ID, result/error status, and associated JSON data.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the identifier of the response message.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response indicates a successful result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result data if the response is successful.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response represents an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves error details if the response indicates an error.
